plugin.name: pixdecor
plugin._long: A highly configurable and optionally fancy decorator plugin for wayfire.

option.name: border_size
option._long: Sets the border size in pixels.

option.name: titlebar
option._long: When to render a titlebar with title text and buttons.

option.name: maximized_borders
option._long: Whether or not to render side and bottom decorations on maximized windows.

option.name: maximized_shadows
option._long: Whether or not to allocate space for shadows on maximized windows.

option.name: ignore_views
option._short: Decoration disabled for specified window types
option._long: Disables window decoration for windows matching the specified criteria.

option.name: always_decorate
option._short: Decoration applied for specified window types
option._long: Forces window decoration for windows matching the specified criteria.

option.name: title_font
option._long: Font to use for the titlebar. Uses the system font by default or if invalid.

option.name: fg_color
option._long: Color of the window border when it has focus.

option.name: bg_color
option._long: Color of the window border when it does not have focus.

option.name: fg_text_color
option._long: Color of the window titlebar text when it has focus.

option.name: bg_text_color
option._long: Color of the window titlebar text when it does not have focus.

option.name: title_text_align
option._long: Sets the alignment of the titlebar text.

option.name: overlay_engine
option._long: Sets the overlay engine.

option.name: effect_type
option._long: Sets the effect type.

option.name: effect_color
option._long: Color of the titlebar background effect.

option.name: animate
option._long: WARNING: Enabling this option can use lots of system resources. Enables animating and constant repainting of window decorations.

option.name: rounded_corner_radius
option._long: The radius for corners.

option.name: shadow_radius
option._long: The radius for shadows.

option.name: shadow_color
option._long: Color of the drop shadows.

option.name: button_color
option._long: Color of the minimize, maximize and close buttons.

option.name: button_line_thickness
option._long: The thickness used to draw the minimize, maximize and close button lines.

option.name: left_button_spacing
option._long: The space between each button on the left.

option.name: right_button_spacing
option._long: The space between each button on the right.

option.name: left_button_x_offset
option._long: Use this option to move the buttons on the left to the left or right.

option.name: right_button_x_offset
option._long: Use this option to move the buttons on the right to the left or right.

option.name: button_y_offset
option._long: Use this option to move buttons up or down.

option.name: button_hover_duration
option._long: The time the hover animation will last, in milliseconds.

option.name: button_minimize_image
option._long: The png image to use for the minimize button.

option.name: button_maximize_image
option._long: The png image to use for the maximize button.

option.name: button_restore_image
option._long: The png image to use for the restore button.

option.name: button_close_image
option._long: The png image to use for the close button.

option.name: button_minimize_hover_image
option._long: The png image to use when hovering the minimize button.

option.name: button_maximize_hover_image
option._long: The png image to use when hovering the maximize button.

option.name: button_restore_hover_image
option._long: The png image to use when hovering the restore button.

option.name: button_close_hover_image
option._long: The png image to use when hovering the close button.

option.name: enable_shade
option._long: Use the axis binding or scroll on the titlebar of pixdecor windows to shade windows into their respective titlebars.

option.name: shade_duration
option._long: The duration of the shade animation in milliseconds.

option.name: shade_modifier
option._long: When the shade modifier key is held down, you can scroll down and up to shade and unshade the window.

option.name: shade_toggle
option._long: Toggles shade for the active window.

option.name: csd_titlebar_height
option._long: Because there is no way to know the client surface titlebar height, this is an option to adjust it.
